mapper.select: select duty_institution_id id, d1.duty_id duty_id, d1.duty_name duty_name, i2.institution_id institution_id, i2.institution_name institution_name from t_role_duty d1,t_role_institution i2,t_role_duty_institution di3 where d1.duty_id=di3.duty_id and i2.institution_id =di3.institution_id and di3.duty_id = #{dutyId} and di3.institution_id =#{institutionId} ;

select duty_institution_id id, d1.duty_id duty_id, d1.duty_name duty_name, i2.institution_id institution_id, i2.institution_name institution_name from t_role_duty d1,t_role_institution i2,t_role_duty_institution di3 where d1.duty_id=di3.duty_id and i2.institution_id =di3.institution_id
